TopicTitle: Bad mod interaction with Contract Configurator, causing career mode to be unplayable

Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.11.1 Windows
Problem: Console log is spammed with the following error, causing  career mode to be unplayable, prevent me from exiting buildings, save the game or load the VAB : 

MissingMethodException: void ContractConfigurator.LoggingUtil.LogVerbose(object,string)

UnityEngine.DebugLogHandler:Internal_LogException(Exception, Object)
UnityEngine.DebugLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)
ModuleManager.UnityLogHandle.InterceptLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)
UnityEngine.Logger:LogException(Exception, Object)
UnityEngine.Debug:CallOverridenDebugHandler(Exception, Object)

Mods installed:

Spoiler

Reproduction steps:

I've tried isolating Contract Configurator on its own, and I've also removed all my contract packs. I also tried removing Clickthrough blocker and any mods that rely on that, but that wasn't the issue.

Log:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/mo4t4igp397c1su/AABXrh8K_cmALFrhwTZSfd_ea?dl=0
I got it fixed, turns out it was the remotetech contract pack
